explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a deep neural network model for cryptocurrency forecasting, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The model described is a deep neural network, specifically a CNN-LSTM architecture, which is a type of deep learning model.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model is a multiple-input deep neural network, indicating the use of neural networks.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model incorporates CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) as part of its architecture.
explanations.CNN: The model uses CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) for processing cryptocurrency data.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The model also uses LSTM, which is a type of recurrent neural network (RNN).
explanations.long short-term memory: The model incorporates LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) for handling sequential data in cryptocurrency forecasting.
explanations.LSTM: The model uses LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) as part of its architecture for sequence prediction.
